channel.title: Where can I get pre drop vocal samples
channel.description: Does anyone know where I can find some good pre drop vocal samples, I have a really awesome song but I want to make it even more awesome with a vocal sample

item.title: Where can I get pre drop vocal samples
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Worth checking out Landr’s Samples site/resource: samples.landr.com

The library contains a decent number of free, royalty-free vocal clips and samples.

Scroll down and select the ‘Sounds’ tab, then use Instruments filter to target just ‘Vocals’.

 
Also worth checking out…

Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library

Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library

The Converse Rubber Tracks Sample Library is a royalty-free library of one shots, loops and stems recorded at Rubber Tracks.

I’ve grabbed a couple from there in the past.

Read full topic

item.title: Where can I get pre drop vocal samples
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
GarageBand on iOS (or Mac too but I’m assuming we all already have some kind of iOS device ) has a pretty good gamut of effects and recording capability. If you know exactly what you want the vocal sample to be and have an idea effect wise of what you’re looking for it might fit the bill, plus it costs zero dollars.

The pill sounds and vocal sample I used in Capzuul were of my own making. You can also mess with the pitch and other effects in GB prior to “export to” Auxy. Just throwing it out there…

Read full topic
